job.title: Video Machine Learning Algorithm Engineer
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brImagine what you could do here At Apple new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products services and customer experiences very quickly Do you bring passion and dedication to your job If so we are looking for individuals like youbrbrbrWe are looking for talent who will join us to craft the future of video Our team develops cutting edge technology and system that enable intelligent and interactive video experience in Apples media products such as Photos Camera FaceTime AirPlay SideCar TV etc You will work closely with a group of highly motivated specialists to develop exciting machine learning technologies that will make a huge impact in the productsbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brStrong experience in video and machine learning algorithm development brbrDeep understanding in neural network strong experience in designing and optimizing networksbrbrStrong programming debugging and problem solving skillsbrbrCreative and detailorientedbrbrStrong communication skillsbrbrYou are upbeat adaptable and results oriented with a positive attitudebrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brAs a video machine learning algorithm engineer in our team you will be responsible for developing machine learning technologies implementing and optimizing the solution and shipping it in the products You will be responsible for developing new algorithms improving existing ones designing neural network architectures training implementing integrating and optimizing networks etcbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brMS Computer Science or MS Electrical Engineering or equivalentbrbr brstrongAdditional Requirementsbrstrong brNice to have but not required brbrExperience developing realtime and low latency video system solutionsbrbrExperience in training data acquisition and managementbrbr brRole Number 200269294brbr
